pr_title: PLFM 6158 - Part A: Add OBJECT_TYPE to annotation index

timeline.message:
PLFM-6158: Added OBJECT_TYPE to replication index

Initial refactor of the replication (annotations) index to include the object type so that we can extend it beyond entities
PLFM-6158: Refactor object data index CRUD
PLFM-6158: Additional refactoring of TableIndexDAO OBJECT_TYPE ops

timeline.author: john-hill
john-hill

timeline.bodyText: swap order ID is more selective (more unique) than type.
timeline.author: john-hill
john-hill
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -265,15 +268,17 @@ public static Long getReservedColumnId(String columnName) {
 			+ ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_STRING_LIST_VALUE + " JSON,"
 			+ ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_LONG_LIST_VALUE+" JSON,"
 			+ ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_BOOLEAN_LIST_VALUE+" JSON,"
-			+ "PRIMARY KEY("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_ENTITY_ID+","+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_KEY+","+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_TYPE+"),"
-			+ "INDEX `ENTITY_ID_IDX` ("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_ENTITY_ID+"),"
-			+ "INDEX `ENTITY_ID_ANNO_KEY_IDX` ("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_ENTITY_ID+","+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_KEY+"),"
+			+ "PRIMARY KEY("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_OBJECT_TYPE +"," +ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_OBJECT_ID+","+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_KEY+","+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_TYPE+"),"

timeline.author: john-hill
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -265,15 +268,17 @@ public static Long getReservedColumnId(String columnName) {
 			+ ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_STRING_LIST_VALUE + " JSON,"
 			+ ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_LONG_LIST_VALUE+" JSON,"
 			+ ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_BOOLEAN_LIST_VALUE+" JSON,"
-			+ "PRIMARY KEY("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_ENTITY_ID+","+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_KEY+","+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_TYPE+"),"
-			+ "INDEX `ENTITY_ID_IDX` ("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_ENTITY_ID+"),"
-			+ "INDEX `ENTITY_ID_ANNO_KEY_IDX` ("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_ENTITY_ID+","+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_KEY+"),"
+			+ "PRIMARY KEY("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_OBJECT_TYPE +"," +ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_OBJECT_ID+","+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_KEY+","+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_TYPE+"),"
+			+ "INDEX `OBJECT_TYPE_OBJECT_ID_IDX` ("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_OBJECT_TYPE + "," + ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_OBJECT_ID+"),"
+			+ "INDEX `OBJECT_TYPE_OBJECT_ID_ANNO_KEY_IDX` ("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_OBJECT_TYPE +","+ ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_OBJECT_ID+","+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_KEY+"),"
 			+ "INDEX `STRING_VALUE_IDX`("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_STRING_VALUE+"),"
-			+" CONSTRAINT `ENTITY_ID_FK` FOREIGN KEY ("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_ENTITY_ID+") REFERENCES "+ENTITY_REPLICATION_TABLE+" ("+ENTITY_REPLICATION_COL_ID+") ON DELETE CASCADE "
+			+" CONSTRAINT `OBJECT_TYPE_OBJECT_ID_FK` FOREIGN KEY ("+ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_OBJECT_TYPE + "," + ANNOTATION_REPLICATION_COL_OBJECT_ID+") REFERENCES "
